methods.description: Extra information about the wallet.

parameters.description: name of the wallet to create

Loads the private key into the specified account. Returns which account it was actually imported to.

parameters.name: wif_key
parameters.description: A private key in bitcoin Wallet Import Format (WIF)

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: the name of the account the key should be imported into, if null then the key must belong to an active account

parameters.name: create_new_account
parameters.description: If true, the wallet will attempt to create a new account for the name provided rather than import the key into an existing account

parameters.name: rescan
parameters.description: If true, the wallet will rescan the blockchain looking for transactions that involve this private key

methods.description: Closes the curent wallet if one is open

methods.description: Enables or disables automatic wallet backups

parameters.description: true to enable and false to disable

methods.description: Set transaction expiration time

parameters.description: seconds before new transactions expire

methods.description: Lists transaction history for the specified account

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: the name of the account for which the transaction history will be returned, "" for all accounts

parameters.name: asset_symbol
parameters.description: only include transactions involving the specified asset, or "" to include all

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit the number of returned transactions; negative for most recent and positive for least recent. 0 does not limit

parameters.name: start_block_num
parameters.description: the earliest block number to list transactions from; 0 to include all transactions starting from genesis

parameters.name: end_block_num
parameters.description: the latest block to list transaction from; -1 to include all transactions ending at the head block
